pageSetting.title: 行员贷款绩效工资查询

attribute.value: select lbdh as key, lbmc as value from csb_hylb

col.title: 实发贷款利息收入绩效
实发贷款管户管理绩效
实发贷款模拟利润绩效
当年新增不良贷款扣罚与返还

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select gzhz.tjrq as tjrq, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc,hl.lbmc,gw.gwmc,gzhz.lxsrjl,gzhz.khgljl,gzhz.dktfjl,gzhz.dkmnlrjl, gzhz.dqshlwdbkf,gzhz.qxkf,gzhz.bldkkf,gzhz.dnxzbldkkf,gzhz.wnblyjkf,gzhz.dkcsssxkf,gzhz.dkfxjjt,gzhz.dkfxjfh,gzhz.yfgz,gzhz.sfgz, 1 as dkyj,2 as dkzl,gzhz.khdxdh from dkjx_dkjxgzhz gzhz inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = gzhz.khdxdh inner join csb_hylb hl on gzhz.hylb=hl.lbdh inner join csb_hygw gw on gzhz.hygw=gw.gwbh inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.jgdh = gzhz.jgdh inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QXHY($tjrq$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qxhy on hy.khdxdh=qxhy.khdxdh where 1=1 and gzhz.tjrq =$tjrq$ and gzhz.hylb='$hylb$' and hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$)

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select gzhz.tjrq as tjrq, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc,hl.lbmc,gw.gwmc,gzhz.lxsrjl,gzhz.khgljl,gzhz.dktfjl,gzhz.dkmnlrjl, gzhz.dqshlwdbkf,gzhz.qxkf,gzhz.bldkkf,gzhz.dnxzbldkkf,gzhz.wnblyjkf,gzhz.dkcsssxkf,gzhz.dkfxjjt,gzhz.dkfxjfh,gzhz.yfgz,gzhz.sfgz, 1 as dkyj,2 as dkzl,gzhz.khdxdh from dkjx_dkjxgzhz gzhz inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = gzhz.khdxdh inner join csb_hylb hl on gzhz.hylb=hl.lbdh inner join csb_hygw gw on gzhz.hygw=gw.gwbh inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.jgdh = gzhz.jgdh inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QXHY($tjrq$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qxhy on hy.khdxdh=qxhy.khdxdh where 1=1 and gzhz.tjrq =$tjrq$ and gzhz.hylb='$hylb$' and hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) ) t
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select lbdh as key, lbmc as value from csb_hylb
